dt-option.summary: Callback for whenever a TR element is created for the table's body.
dt-option.description:
This callback is executed when a `tag TR` element is created (and all `tag TD` child elements have been inserted), or registered if using a DOM source, allowing manipulation of the `tag TR` element.

		This is particularly useful when using deferred rendering (`dt-init deferRender`) or server-side processing (`dt-init serverSide`) so you can add events, class name information or otherwise format the row when it is created.
dt-option.name: createdRow

example.title: Add a class to the row, conditionally based on the row's data

parameter.content: `tag TR` row element that has just been created
parameter.name: row

parameter.content: Raw data source (array or object) for this row
parameter.name: data

parameter.content: The index of the row in DataTables' internal storage.
parameter.name: dataIndex
